about_the_game:
“Our hotel is not responsible for any accidents that occur during work.”
Hotel Wazuna is a hotel where strange incidents occur every night but have no intention of doing anything about them.
The main character, Hiroshi, is in urgent need of money.
He saw an announcement for a part-time job at the night reception at Hotel Wazuna.
I will be working at this hotel.

The hotel's work is simple. Complete all tasks assigned every night
The protagonist must complete all tasks by referring to the instructions provided by the hotel.
Everything is written in the instructions. Please read the instructions carefully.

Various Jump Square events
During the three days of hotel work, the protagonist can experience a different Jump Square every day.
Read carefully and avoid the events that are randomly given every day.

Realistic and creepy sound
The sound emphasizes the goosebumps that come from the silence that can be felt in the early morning hours, so even minor sounds such as the player's footsteps, the sound of an elevator, or the sound of a door opening can give you goosebumps. Be sure to wear a headset to enjoy this sound more realistically.

A mission other than survival
The goal of the game is to avoid jump square events and complete all tasks rather than simply survive.
Read the tasks carefully and survive until the end to complete all tasks.
